Sentencas: High entropy materials offer optimal conditions for regulating and modifying new material properties due to their vast composition space.
Titulo: The influence of Sc3+doping on the crystal structure and electrical conductivity of Sr(Ti0.2Zr0.2Y0.2Sn0.2Hf0.2)O3-σ high-entropy perovskite oxides

Sentencas: Through traditional solid phase sintering, this article successfully synthesized a series of Sr(Ti0.2Zr0.2Y0.2Sn0.2Hf0.2Sc0.2x)O3-sigma high entropy perovskite oxides with varying Sc3+ doping concentrations and comprehensively investigated the microstructure morphology, crystal structure, and electrical conductivity of Sc-doped HEPs as well as their influence on oxygen transfer rate.
Titulo: The influence of Sc3+doping on the crystal structure and electrical conductivity of Sr(Ti0.2Zr0.2Y0.2Sn0.2Hf0.2)O3-σ high-entropy perovskite oxides

Sentencas: The results demonstrate the successful incorporation of Sc3+ into the high entropy lattice, resulting in a transformation of the crystal to a positively cubic structure with enhanced reciprocity.
Titulo: The influence of Sc3+doping on the crystal structure and electrical conductivity of Sr(Ti0.2Zr0.2Y0.2Sn0.2Hf0.2)O3-σ high-entropy perovskite oxides

Sentencas: While the lattice vibration of BO6 octahedron is weakened by the introduction of Sc3+, it has no impact on the phase stability of the crystal structure.
Titulo: The influence of Sc3+doping on the crystal structure and electrical conductivity of Sr(Ti0.2Zr0.2Y0.2Sn0.2Hf0.2)O3-σ high-entropy perovskite oxides

Sentencas: Moreover, The results of the electrochemical impedance spectroscopy test demonstrate that at a temperature of 750 degrees C, with a doping amount of Sc3+ at 0.14, the conductivity (sigma) of Sc3+ is measured to be 5.74 x 10-3 S/cm, exhibiting an increase of 61.7% compared to non-doped samples.
Titulo: The influence of Sc3+doping on the crystal structure and electrical conductivity of Sr(Ti0.2Zr0.2Y0.2Sn0.2Hf0.2)O3-σ high-entropy perovskite oxides

Sentencas: Correspondingly, the activation energy (Ea) is reduced from 0.51 eV to 0.39 eV as well.
Titulo: The influence of Sc3+doping on the crystal structure and electrical conductivity of Sr(Ti0.2Zr0.2Y0.2Sn0.2Hf0.2)O3-σ high-entropy perovskite oxides

Sentencas: This doping strategy effectively expands the potential applications of high entropy perovskite oxides in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: The influence of Sc3+doping on the crystal structure and electrical conductivity of Sr(Ti0.2Zr0.2Y0.2Sn0.2Hf0.2)O3-σ high-entropy perovskite oxides

Sentencas: These findings serve as a driving force for further investigation into high entropy ceramics of the strontium series that exhibit optimal properties.
Titulo: The influence of Sc3+doping on the crystal structure and electrical conductivity of Sr(Ti0.2Zr0.2Y0.2Sn0.2Hf0.2)O3-σ high-entropy perovskite oxides
